stimulusHtml: Let h be the depth, in feet, of oil in the tank. How fast is the depth of oil in the tank increasing when h = 4 ? Indicate units of measure.

features.html:
An oil storage tank has the shape as shown above, obtained by revolving the curve  y = 9 625 x 4 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3CEE@ from x=0 to x=5 about the y-axis, where x and y are measured in feet.

Oil flows into the tank at the constant rate of 8 cubic feet per minute.
